3)
```{r}
samsung_summary <- items %>%
  filter(brand == "Samsung") %>% 
  summarise(
    num = n(),
    mean = mean(rating),
    sd = sd(rating)
  )

items %>% 
  filter(brand == "Samsung") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = rating)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = after_stat(density)), col = "white") +
  stat_function(
    fun = dnorm,
    args = list(
      mean = samsung_summary$mean,
      sd = samsung_summary$sd
    ),
    col = "springgreen4"
  )
```
